data.name: The Backworld
data.detailed_description:
The Backworld is a turn-based RPG that focuses heavily on exploration and discovery. You have just moved to your new home in Sunny Ville, and things seem to be going awry. Apparently, mysterious doors have been popping up around town, and those who decided to explore them have gone missing. On top of that, the city seems to be in constant chaos, with endless problems everywhere. Rumors have been going around that the two issues are related. Do you dare venture beyond the doors to solve the mystery?

Battle Across The Backworld




  • Fight hundreds of enemies in an engaging turn-based combat system!
  • Gain an advantage before battle through light action elements in the overworld!



  • Your power increases from finding experience and equipment rather than grinding combat battles.
  • Create unique synergies between the abilities granted by equipment in tandem with your party member's innate skills!

Explore The Backworld




  • Go in any direction you want, only gated by various ability unlocks.
  • Avoid particularly dangerous enemies in the overworld to survive.



  • Find all of the unique locations, including areas inspired by the liminal spaces of The Backrooms!
  • Meet fascinating characters and recruit party members to help you on your quest!

data.short_description: The Backworld is a nonlinear turn-based RPG that focuses on exploration. It also features light action and terrain traversal elements in the overworld. Journey across different dimensions through liminal spaces inspired by The Backrooms; while facing the bizarre inhabitants of the multiverse.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
